<img id="aimg_B0n00" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://lovelyelfpop.atomgit.net/macless_haystack_pages/imgs/carkeys/0.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://lovelyelfpop.atomgit.net/macless_haystack_pages/imgs/carkeys/0.jpg"><br>
昨天给一个网友改装宝马车钥匙，增加AirTag定位芯片。他说改装不成功没关系，车钥匙弄坏他承担<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/default/lol.gif" smilieid="12" border="0" alt=""><br>
<br>
记录下改装过程<br>
(另：自制AirTag定位器教程 看我之前的帖子 《自制AirTag，支持安卓/鸿蒙/PC和Home Assistant，无需iphone》<br>
<br>
